name: Higgs Boson: Minimal Puzzle
description:
Higgs Boson: Minimal Puzzle is a relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where the player must rotate pieces to assemble a particle accelerator.
Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other;

Featuring:

  • Unique challenges that make the player think and act always in an intelligent way;
  • Relaxing and beautiful music;
